changeSet.sql:
WITH tp AS (SELECT exercise.id, exercise.template_participation_id FROM exercise WHERE exercise.discriminator = 'P' AND exercise.template_participation_id IS NOT NULL) , sp AS (SELECT exercise.id, exercise.solution_participation_id FROM exercise WHERE exercise.discriminator = 'P' AND exercise.solution_participation_id IS NOT NULL)
, fe AS (SELECT feedback.id, feedback.text, exercise.id AS exercise_id FROM feedback LEFT JOIN result ON feedback.result_id = result.id LEFT JOIN participation ON result.participation_id = participation.id , exercise WHERE feedback.type = 3 AND feedback.text IS NOT NULL AND feedback.text NOT LIKE 'SubPolFeedbackIdentifier%' AND feedback.reference IS NULL AND (participation.exercise_id = exercise.id OR participation.id = (SELECT tp.template_participation_id FROM tp WHERE tp.id = exercise.id) OR participation.id = (SELECT sp.solution_participation_id FROM sp WHERE sp.id = exercise.id)))
UPDATE feedback, programming_exercise_test_case, fe SET test_case_id = texttc.id WHERE feedback.type = 3 AND feedback.text IS NOT NULL AND feedback.text NOT LIKE 'SubPolFeedbackIdentifier%' AND feedback.reference IS NULL AND feedback.id = fe.id AND programming_exercise_test_case.test_name = feedback.text AND programming_exercise_test_case.exercise_id = fe.exercise_id
UPDATE feedback SET text = NULL WHERE test_case_id IS NOT NULL
